data","schema":{"request_id":{"type":"number","name":"request_id"},"message":{"type":"string","name":"message"},"success":{"type":"boolean","name":"success"}},"datasourceId":"datasource_plus_7cecc82272ae418881ca158ff2affebf","parameters":[{"name":"title","default":"ssdsdsd"},{"name":"request_type","default":"Schedulazione"},{"name":"planner_email","default":"ggilea@sorint.com"},{"name":"start_date","default":"2025/10/20"},{"name":"end_date","default":"2025/10/25"},{"name":"total_days_planned","default":"455"},{"name":"team_json","default":"[{\"first_name\":\"Mario\",\"last_name\":\"Rossi\",\"company_seniority\":\"Senior\",\"aci_days\":20}]"}],"fields":{"sql":"WITH new_req AS (\n    INSERT INTO requests (\n        title, request_type, planner_email, start_date, end_date, total_days_planned, status\n    ) VALUES (\n        {{title}}, \n        {{request_type}}::aci_type, \n        {{planner_email}}, \n        TO_DATE({{start_date}}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), \n        TO_DATE({{end_date}}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), \n        {{total_days_planned}}, \n        'Pending'\n    )\n    RETURNING id\n),\ninsert_team AS (\n    INSERT INTO request_team (request_id, first_name, last_name, company_seniority, aci_days)\n    SELECT \n        (SELECT id FROM new_req), \n        item.first_name, item.last_name, item.company_seniority, (item.aci_days)::int\n    FROM jsonb_to_recordset(COALESCE(NULLIF({{team_json}}, ''), '[]')::jsonb) \n    AS item(first_name text, last_name text, company_seniority text, aci_days int)\n    RETURNING request_id\n)\nSELECT \n    id as request_id, \n    'Richiesta creata con successo' as message, \n    true as success \nFROM new_req;"},"queryVerb":"create","nestedSchemaFields":{},"nullDefaultSupport":true,"createdAt":"2025-11-25T10:21:43.464Z","updatedAt":"2025-11-25T13:39:11.095Z","_revisions":{"start":2,"ids":["c229a6fbeae97fd9430800434e75ae17","e105777b2b33d7e6f721be5de0635d5a"]}},{"_id":"query_datasource_plus_7cecc82272ae418881ca158ff2affebf_614e8033c21a4e68aad68130e17de468","_rev":"1-574d01051238f841b1484ff7cd8de4cb","name":"Global ac requests","transformer":"return \n    r.id,\n    r.title,\n    r.request_type,\n    r.planner_email,\n    r.start_date,\n    r.end_date,\n    r.total_days_planned,\n    r.status,\n    r.managed_by_email,\n    COALESCE(\n        jsonb_agg(\n            jsonb_build_object(\n                'first_name', rt.first_name, \n                'last_name', rt.last_name, \n                'company_seniority', rt.company_seniority, \n                'aci_days', rt.aci_days\n            )\n        ) FILTER (WHERE rt.id IS NOT NULL), \n        '[]'::jsonb\n    ) AS team_list\n\nFROM requests r\nLEFT JOIN request_team rt ON r.id = rt.request_id\nWHERE r.request_type = 'Formazione'\nGROUP BY r.id\nORDER BY r.start_date DESC;"},"queryVerb":"read","nestedSchemaFields":{"team_list":{"aci_days":{"type":"number","name":"aci_days"},"last_name":{"type":"string","name":"last_name"},"first_name":{"type":"string","name":"first_name"},"company_seniority":{"type":"string","name":"company_seniority"}}},"nullDefaultSupport":true,"createdAt":"2025-11-26T14:46:39.703Z","updatedAt":"2025-11-26T14:46:39.703Z","_revisions":{"start":1,"ids":["574d01051238f841b1484ff7cd8de4cb"]}},{"_id":"query_datasource_plus_7cecc82272ae418881ca158ff2affebf_8d6d1d6b2abd46f190ef78b1b0083e40","_rev":"1-cbe5eebac32b2c1867e6174e207180eb","name":"people","transformer":"return data","schema":{"id":{"type":"number","name":"id"},"title":{"type":"string","name":"title"},"request_type":{"type":"string","name":"request_type"},"planner_email":{"type":"string","name":"planner_email"},"start_date":{"type":"string","name":"start_date"},"end_date":{"type":"string","name":"end_date"},"total_days_planned":{"type":"number","name":"total_days_planned"},"status":{"type":"string","name":"status"},"managed_by_email":{"type":"string","name":"managed_by_email"},"team_list":{"type":"json","name":"team_list","subtype":"array"}},"datasourceId":"datasource_plus_7cecc82272ae418881ca158ff2affebf","parameters":[],"fields":{"sql":"SELECT \n    r.id,\n    r.title,\n    r.request_type,\n    r.planner_email,\n    r.start_date,\n    r.end_date,\n    r.total_days_planned,\n    r.status,\n    r.managed_by_email,\n    \n    -- Aggrega i membri del team in un array JSON\n    COALESCE(\n        jsonb_agg(\n            jsonb_build_object(\n                'first_name', rt.first_name, \n                'last_name', rt.last_name, \n                'company_seniority', rt.company_seniority, \n                'aci_days', rt.aci_days\n            )\n        ) FILTER (WHERE rt.id IS NOT NULL), \n        '[]'::jsonb\n    ) AS team_list\n\nFROM requests r\nLEFT JOIN request_team rt ON r.id = rt.request_id\nWHERE r.request_type IN ('Schedulazione', 'Core Role')\nGROUP BY r.id\nORDER BY r.start_date DESC;"},"queryVerb":"read","nestedSchemaFields":{"team_list":{"aci_days":{"type":"number","name":"aci_days"},"last_name":{"type":"string","name":"last_name"},"first_name":{"type":"string","name":"first_name"},"company_seniority":{"type":"string","name":"company_seniority"}}},"nullDefaultSupport":true,"createdAt":"2025-11-26T14:52:11.967Z","updatedAt":"2025-11-26T14:52:11.967Z","_revisions":{"start":1,"ids":["cbe5eebac32b2c1867e6174e207180eb"]}},{"_id":"query_datasource_plus_7cecc82272ae418881ca158ff2affebf_987af76627c6458380be31a7e2b911c0","_rev":"1-8b1c8e894fc5af4c9ce091ca7876de27","name":"Update request","transformer":"return data","schema":{"updated":{"type":"boolean","name":"updated"}},"datasourceId":"datasource_plus_7cecc82272ae418881ca158ff2affebf","parameters":[{"name":"title","default":"dd"},{"name":"request_type","default":"Formazione"},{"name":"planner_email","default":"ggilea@sorint.com"},{"name":"start_date","default":"20/10/2025"},{"name":"end_date","default":"25/10/2025"},{"name":"total_days_planned","default":"555"},{"name":"note","default":"xxxxx"},{"name":"team_json","default":"[{\"first_name\":\"Mario\",\"last_name\":\"Rossi\",\"company_seniority\":\"Senior\",\"aci_days\":20}]"}],"fields":{"sql":"WITH update_header AS (\n    UPDATE requests\n    SET \n        title = {{title}},\n        request_type = {{request_type}}::aci_type,\n        planner_email = {{planner_email}},\n        start_date = TO_DATE({{start_date}}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),\n        end_date = TO_DATE({{end_date}}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),\n        total_days_planned = {{total_days_planned}},\n        note = {{note}}, \n        updated_at = NOW()\n    WHERE id = {{id}}\n    RETURNING id \n),\ndelete_old_team AS (\n    DELETE FROM request_team WHERE request_id = {{id}} RETURNING request_id \n)\nINSERT INTO request_team (request_id, first_name, last_name, company_seniority, aci_days)\nSELECT \n    {{id}}, \n    item.first_name, item.last_name, item.company_seniority, (item.aci_days)::int \nFROM jsonb_to_recordset(COALESCE(NULLIF({{team_json}}, ''), '[]')::jsonb) \nAS item(first_name text, last_name text, company_seniority text, aci_days int);"},"queryVerb":"update","nestedSchemaFields":{},"nullDefaultSupport":true,"createdAt":"2025-11-25T10:25:52.162Z","updatedAt":"2025-11-25T10:25:52.162Z","_revisions":{"start":1,"ids":["8b1c8e894fc5af4c9ce091ca7876de27"]}},{"_id":"query_datasource_plus_7cecc82272ae418881ca158ff2affebf_cca0e840eb4042c69f3a7a78896ced64","_rev":"1-cb28e58449cda1b5b93d5342e35bf603","name":"manage
